title: 1912 T207 lot of Otto Miller, Donnelly and Sweeney
author: Brian Van Horn

posts.post_title: 1912 T207 lot of Otto Miller, Donnelly and Sweeney
posts.post_content: This is a 1912 T207 lot of Otto Miller (Cycle back), Donnelly (Anonymous Factory #25 Virginia) and Sweeney (Cycle). Price is $700.00 plus $6.00 s/h.
